name: Green Squares
description:
Pure Simple Physics Fun

Green Squares is A colourful physics based time trial, where there are green squares, that need to be not green!

Main Features:
  • 24 Levels
  • Multiple Difficulties per level
  • Endless variants of each level, relax in your favourite levels playing them on an infinite loop, or practice for your next PB!
  • Idle mode in main menu, just sit back and relax
  • 13 Upbeat Songs, and yes there's a volume slider so you can listen to your own favourite playlist!
